personalInfo.name: Karthik Lal
personalInfo.title: IT Manager, Full Stack Developer, Cybersecurity Enthusiast
personalInfo.bio: I'm Karthik Lal, 25, a technology enthusiast specializing in cybersecurity, Linux kernel development, web development, and graphic design. I have 6.8+ years of experience in IT operations, currently managing infrastructure at IHCL with a focus on network security, guest connectivity, and in-room technology solutions for the hospitality sector.
personalInfo.professionalSummary: My work reflects a commitment to innovation, usability, and design. I enjoy building secure, scalable systems and improving digital experiences for users. I have led IT operations, designed modern web applications, and provided hands-on support in dynamic environments. I am currently pursuing an MCA to further strengthen my technical and leadership skills. Outside of technology, I have a passion for photography, capturing moments that inspire creativity.
